name: craftos-pc
description: Adds the ability to open CraftOS-PC windows inside VS Code, as well as some ease-of-use functionality to make programming easier.

craftos-pc.executablePath.windows.description: The path to the CraftOS-PC executable on Windows. Must be the console version.

craftos-pc.executablePath.mac.description: The path to the CraftOS-PC executable (NOT the application) on macOS.

craftos-pc.executablePath.linux.description: The path to the CraftOS-PC executable on Linux.

craftos-pc.executablePath.all.description: The path to the CraftOS-PC executable. Overrides any platform defaults if set.

craftos-pc.dataPath.description: The path to the data directory to use for CraftOS-PC. This defaults to the standard data directory location. The path is relative to the workspace directory.

viewsWelcome.contents:
You must start CraftOS-PC before using this tab.
[Start CraftOS-PC](command:craftos-pc.open)
